title: The Eye of the Wind
description: 1966. Revised edition. 315 pages. Paperback book with pictorial cover. Black and white illustrations throughout by author. Pages and binding are presentable with no major defects. Minor issues present such as mild cracking, inscriptions, inserts, light foxing, tanning and thumb marking. Overall a good condition item. Paper cover has mild edge-wear with light rubbing and creasing. Some light marking and tanning.
author: Peter Markham Scott
